thread.title: Charge Ahead with LifeProof FRE Power for iPhone 6s
thread.title_full: Charge Ahead with LifeProof FRE Power for iPhone 6s

author: admin
title: Charge Ahead with LifeProof FRE Power for iPhone 6s
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 6:30 AM Companies mentioned in this article: LifeProof 
SAN DIEGO, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- A mile past the last rope, they trek through a foot of fresh powder deep in the backcountry, snowboards on their backs. With two miles to the summit and one percent battery remaining, is it time to power down? Not with LifeProof FR Power, available for pre-order now for iPhone 6s. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20151021/279467 
FR Power defies limits by taking iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s further than they have ever gone before by combining LifeProof's legendary four-proof protection with advanced technology for double the battery life. Charge ahead with industry-leading waterproof protection for more Live Photos and 4K videos in almost every environment. 
"We challenge our engineers to defy what is expected and they've gone well beyond that with our waterproof iPhone 6s battery case," said LifeProof President and CEO Pete Lindgren. "FR? Power provides protection and power so you can adventure further than ever before. The combination of iPhone 6s Live Photos and 4k video with double the battery life from FR Power lets you capture better content and keep shooting longer than ever before." 
FR Power defies limits with a built-in 2,600 mAh lithium ion battery, doubling the battery life of iPhone 6s. The iPhone 6s battery case boasts four-proof protection to help guard iPhone 6s from water, drop, dirt and snow. A built-in scratch protector helps keep the brilliant 3D Touch display safe from scratches, yet allows for uninhibited use of all the iPhone 6s features and functions, including front-facing Retina Flash and 2(nd) generation Touch ID. It is also compatible with iPhone 6. 
FR Power for iPhone 6s is now available for pre-order in black. To learn more, visit lifeproof.com .
